projects.name: Travellers Mod (Worlds Adrift)
projects.description: After the end of Worlds Adrift in July 2019 a fan-made project to recreate elements of the game in Minecraft began, working under the pseudonym Travellers - the original working title of Worlds Adrift. My role on the project is working on implementing the knowledge and schematic systems.

projects.name: UK Elections Hex Map
projects.description: View the results for the past 3 UK General Elections and Parliamentary By-Elections as single-area hexagons coloured by winning party, majority, and turnout. Sources: UK HoC Library (Results), ODI Leeds (Hex Layout)

projects.name: UK Petition Data Viewer
projects.description: Displays UK Parliament petition data by country, constituency. See also totals for MPs by party and percentages of each field.

projects.name: TheNewStudent
projects.description: A mock-up social network for students allowing users to register, joing class groups, complete homework set by teachers and engage with a real-time chat application.

projects.name: Panthers - 4x4 in Schools Competiton
projects.description: Building a functioning 4x4 remote controlled car from scratch and programming a control system which allows 4 wheel steering, throttle control, daylight activated headlights, tilt sensor, and an active suspension for tilt correction.

projects.name: Panthers (Website)
projects.description: An advertisment/portfolio site which highlights the Panthers team's achievements and provides an opportunity for potential sponsers to get in contact.

projects.name: Engine Roller (Worlds Adrift)
projects.description: A speculative project which randomly generates schematics similar to those which appear in Worlds Adrift. Special Thanks to Ziwix (Random Algorithm) and Machine Maker (Schematic names) for their help.

projects.name: WANN/WAAC (Worlds Adrift)
projects.description: A podcast/newscast project recorded weekly based about news in the Worlds Adrift game. I was involved in editing the show, thanks also go to: MeisterKeen (Voice), Vick Viper (Voice), Louthinator (Voice), Mattcus (Editing, Music) as well as any guests which appeared on the show.

projects.name: Snake Game 2
projects.description: Networked HTML5 + JS game like the traditional 'Snake' play against friends, select your colour + name. Built upon a glitch project called snake-game, I added colour support in this version.

projects.name: Multi-User Chat
projects.description: Networked chat application using socket.io events. Doesn't keep message history or any user data.

projects.name: 5 Card Draw (Website)
projects.description: Roll 5 cards, discard any amount and redraw. Hand will be scored against poker rules. Python version available in Card Engine.

projects.name: Card Engine (Python)
projects.description: Simple scripts to represent cards, decks and hands in python. Includes algorithms for scoring hands against 5-card poker rules, shuffling cards, drawing from the deck as well as discarding. Web version also available.

projects.name: Voice Commands
projects.description: An experiment with the experimental WebAPI for speech to text. A few different commands recognised (similar to a voice assistant), recommended to use Google Chrome, other browsers may not support.

projects.name: Godhand Discord Bot (Worlds Adrift)
projects.description: Node.JS server which runs a program which connects to discord to read and send messages. This particular one was built for helping users and moderators in the Worlds Adrift discord chat.

projects.name: Misc. Discord Bots
projects.description: An assortment of discord bots to provide a variety of functionalities. wa-server-bot: show game server statuses in discord. countdown: counts towards a set time. invite-generator: generates unique one time invites to keep servers private. discord-role: add's a role to every member of a server.
